revised_title: The Life and Work of Antoine Laurent Lavoisier
tldr: This article discusses the life and work of Antoine Laurent Lavoisier, a prominent chemist and founder of modern chemistry. It highlights his involvement with the French Farmers' General and the challenges he faced during the French Revolution. Lavoisier's contributions to chemistry, including his work on the oxygen theory of combustion, are also mentioned.
